caption.p: Growth and colony number of A. flavus on the surface of platycladi semen treated with EO at room temperature (20째C) and cold storage (4째C) [ (A) growth of A. flavus on the surface of platycladi semen; a: blank group; b: EO group; c: control group; d: negative control group; 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 indicated the growth of A. flavus on the surface of platycladi semen on day 0, 2, 4, 6, and 8; (B) the number of colonies of A. flavus on the surface of Platycladus orientalis at 0, 2, 4, 6, and 8 days; (C) colony number of A. flavus in the EO group at room temperature (20째C) and cold storage (4째C) at 0, 2, 4, 6, and 8 days.
